content.html: I seem to have developed a Pavlovian connection between the smell of kitten farts and the imminent arrival of cuddles. Which means baby poo stench makes me feel all warm and fuzzy. Concerning

I seem to have developed a Pavlovian connection between the smell of kitten farts and the imminent arrival of cuddles. Which means baby poo stench makes me feel all warm and fuzzy.
